title: Convert string to titlecase
contentHtml:
Write a program to convert string to titlecase

Titlecase is a style of writing in which the first letter of each word is capitalized.

Input  : "hello world"
Output : "Hello World"

markdown:
## Write a program to convert string to titlecase

Titlecase is a style of writing in which the first letter of each word is capitalized.

```
Input  : "hello world"
Output : "Hello World"
```
